info.title: Box Office Report
info.description: This API will return revenue of latest movies.  Data can be sorted by the revenue of opening day, opening weekend or lifetime revenue of the movie.It returns bollywood as well as hollywood movies. Revenue of hollywood movies will be in dollars whereas revenue of Indian movies it will be in rupees.

get.description: Get revenue of all latest movies

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort the data in ascending or descending order. It can be 'desc' or'asc'

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort column for return data. It can either be lifetime,rd,od,ow or w1. 'lifetime' is lifetime revenue, 'w1' is week 1 revenue, 'od' is opening day revenue year
